locations.text: How about this beautiful small shop in a slightly shady neighbourhood?

responses.text: Not here then.
Not much. But a great first shop.

locations.text: How this old store in a neighbourhood?

responses.text: You know you gotta decide for one place or another.
Nice and quiet. This will certainly be a little more low key.

locations.text: I found a cute little shack right next to a lake. This could be a beautiful place to open a  small restaurant. Do you like it?

responses.text: Too bad. It really looks like a place of peace. Just keep in mind we will run out of money eventually.
Such a beautiful place! I am looking forward to working here!

locations.text: How about opening your business right in the city center?

responses.text: I guess you don't like so much the busy life style.
City center it is! This is where life is happening.

menu.text: Let's start by adding some bananas to our stock pile. What do you think?

responses.text: Oh... That's awkward... Nevermind then.
Fantastic! I really don't know what I would have done if you had said no. I already ordered a ton.

menu.text: We should probably decide what kind of hot beverages we want to sell. How about coffee?

responses.text: Really? Everyone likes coffee. But ok. I think this will make some customers quite unhappy.
Nobody can say no to coffee!

menu.text: Do you want to set up a stone oven to make pizza?

responses.text: True. There are enough pizza places around anyway.
Pizza, Pizza, Pizza!

staff.text: Here is a teenager who wants to work for you. Should we hire him? You still could need some staff.

responses.text: Alright. Hopefully someone else comes along.
Well. At least someone. He doesn't seem to be so expensive. So it's probably not a big deal if he messes up.

staff.text: An older lady claims she can make better coffee than we do. She says she would do it for 5 bucks an hour. Should we get her on board?

responses.text: Yeah who knows if she really knows how to even make coffee. However, somebody overheard the conversation and now our customers think we discriminate because of age.
Who de thunk. She is right. Her coffee is awesome. The customers love her. She doesn't even cost a lot of money.

staff.text: A girl with green hair applied to a job with us. She might have given us more information about herself. But the green hair is really all I remembered. Should we hire her?

responses.text: Really? I would have thought she'd be a great addition to the team.
Good choice. I don't think she would let us down.

first_customer.text: Our first customers! Let's be nice and reduce the price today. What do you think? Should we do it?

responses.text: Saving some money. Smart. Although now it looks rather empty. Not many customers were convinced to try a new place on the first day without any special deal.
Such a success! A lot of people came just for the discount. We lost a little bit of money but gained lots of happy customers.
